content: this stylish yet simple neckerchief will keep you warm during the colder seasons this easy to remember chart pattern will be perfect for the television addicted knitter knitted point-up this neckerchief is the perfect first-time-ever lace project italian version 2 graciously translated by mercante 3 is now available there is group on ravelry now dandy neckerchief knit-a-long 4 1 http //actiondetricoter blogspot com/2009/09/foulard-dandy html 2 http //knittiland blogspot com/2010/04/traduzione-dandy-neckerchief html 3 http //www ravelry com/people/mercante 4 http //www ravelry com/groups/dandy-neckerchief
